price: ߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߕߍ߫ ߛߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߘߍ߬ߡߍ߲ ߡߊߣߐ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߝߣߊ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߞߟߍ߬ߓߏߟߏ߲߫ ߟߊߣߊ߬ߕߊ ߘߏ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ نَصۡرَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ لَهُمۡ جُندٞ مُّحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: lā yastaṭīʿūna naṣrahum wahum lahum jundun muḥ'ḍarūna
